TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit PrintDateTimeProperty extends System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintProperty

Docs.summary: Represents a property (and its value) of a printing system hardware or software component.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string attributeName) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the property that the represents.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class for the specified property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The `attributeName` should be spelled exactly the same as the name of some particular <xref:System.DateTime> property of a print system object, including casing. For example, the <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemJobInfo.StartTimeOfDay%2A> property of a <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemJobInfo> object must be spelled "StartTimeOfDay", not "StartTime" or "Starttimeofday".

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string attributeName, object attributeValue) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the property that the represents.
The value of the property that the represents.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class that has the specified value for the specified attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The `attributeName` should be spelled exactly the same as the name of some particular <xref:System.DateTime> property of a print system object, including casing. For example, the <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemJobInfo.StartTimeOfDay%2A> property of a <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemJobInfo> object must be spelled "StartTimeOfDay", not "StartTime" or "Starttimeofday".
